columns.name: AI_INTRCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the interaction record.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: A pointer to the ID of the user who is interacting with the AI agents in this session

columns.name: USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: AI_INTRCT_SESS_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: A status indicating where we are in the life cycle of this session

columns.name: STAT_CHNG_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Tracks the UTC instant when the last status change was made.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: Pointer to the patient encounter associated with the workflow

columns.name: MSG_ID
columns.description: A pointer to the patient message associated with the session
